desc: Award-Winning natural dog grooming & wellbeing products. Because every dog deserves to look, feel & smell great. For ours. For yours. For All DogKind.

layout.text:
Bamboo is a plentiful, renewable natural resource with many remarkable qualities making it an excellent material for our grooming tools!

The Bamboo Groom collection includes 8 different types of grooming tools including combs,
brushes and rakes. The collection offers all of the necessary tools needed to properly groom pets of all sizes with all types of coats.

FREE delivery over £15 - use code FREE15 at checkout.
